statement.p: In 58.62 of the last 29 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{29}}={0.5862}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{29}. \displaystyle{P}={0.5862}\cdot{29}={16.9998}. We round that as requested to 17 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
